name: The Sun Is Also a Star

review.author: christylynn82
review.heading: YA done right :)
review.reviewBody: It's about family, love, and following your hearts desire. The storyline and education of immigrants in America was relevant. Both Jamaican American and Asian American cultures were represented in a beautiful way. The chemistry between Yara and Charles was palpable. The city of New York was the third love of this film. Do yourself a favor, support the young artists. Buy a ticket. You won't be disappointed.

keywords: asian man black woman relationship,metro,train station,subway station,new york city
